title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose of
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Monthly Survey of
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Monthly Survey of 

Construction) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 January 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited statistic (monthly survey construction) order 2023 (2) order shall come operation 1 january 2024

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose of
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 27 November 20191, as amended by Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 2021;2 

“Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006” means Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 December 20063 as amended 
by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 11 March 20084, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20125 and Regulation (EU) 
2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 20 June 20196; 

“survey” means the Monthly Survey of Construction that is conducted by the 
Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining from persons or 
undertakings to which this Order applies information specified in the Schedule, 
including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, other than 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191 amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 2021 2 regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 mean regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 european parliament council 20 december 20063 amended regulation (ec) no 295 2008 european parliament council 11 march 20084 regulation (eu) no 70 2012 european parliament council 18 january 20125 regulation (eu) 2019 1243 european parliament council 20 june 20196 survey mean monthly survey construction conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining person undertaking order applies information specified schedule including purpose compliance regulation (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation context otherwise requires

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose of
heading: 3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking (other than a
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to a person who, or an undertaking (other than a 
public authority) that, is classified for statistical purposes under section F of 
NACE Rev 2 set out in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No. 1893/20063. 

1 OJ No. L 327, 17.12.2019, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 339, 23.9.2021, p. 33 
3 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
5 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
6 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [446] 3

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose of
heading: 4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies
text_raw:
4. A requirement on persons or undertakings to which this Order applies 
to provide, for the purposes of the survey, monthly and in relation to the 
immediately preceding month in the period commencing from 1 February 2024 
and ending on 31 January 2029, information the general nature of which is 
specified in the Schedule, is hereby prescribed. 

 
 
 
 
 4 [446]
text_norm: 4 requirement person undertaking order applies provide purpose survey monthly relation immediately preceding month period commencing 1 february 2024 ending 31 january 2029 information general nature specified schedule hereby prescribed 4 446

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose of
heading: Article 4

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose of
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to the person or
text_raw:
1. 

Information regarding the following, as it relates to the person or 
undertaking concerned and specifying the month to which the information 
relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

the nature of the business; 

the number of persons engaged in the undertaking or by the 
person in the month concerned; 

the value of construction work, 
maintenance, done in the month concerned – 

including 

repairs and 

(i) 

excluding the value of such construction work by 
subcontractors (other than labour only subcontractors) for 
the person or undertaking concerned, or 

(ii) where the value of work referred to in subparagraph (i) 
cannot be excluded, the estimated percentage contribution 
of the work referred to in subparagraph (i) to the value of 
such construction work.

title: section 25(1) of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993) and for the purpose of
heading: Information on the time taken by the persons or undertaking concerned
text_raw:
2. 

Information on the time taken by the persons or undertaking concerned 
to complete the questionnaire, form or other record prepared by the Director 
General for the collection of the information referred to in paragraph 1. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 September, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
